name: Five Nights at Nikocado's (Stickfin)
description: Welcome to Nikocado Avacado's Burger Place, where you can eat as much as you want! Seems like a dream come true - but it is really? I mean, its a fun and happy place during the day! ... But you are not here during the day. You have the nightshift. Now, that might seem so bad... until you spend five nights at Nikocado's.
